mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, NAME, REPLAYSTATUS, OPENFLAG, CREATOPER, CREATTIME, OPER, OPERTIME, CONTENTID, ORDERID, MESSAGEID, SHOPTYPEID, CUSTOMERNAME, CUSTOMERCOUNTRY, SHOPTYPE, ORDERSTATUS, ORDERSOURCE, ORDERTIME, CUSTOMERCOUNTRYID, CUSTOMERCOUNTRYEN, CONTENT, DISPOSEFLAG, RETURNPROSTATUS, RETURNMONEYSTATUS, REPLAYORDERID, RETURNDESCR, RETURNFLAG, ACTUALSAVENUM, KEYWORDS, CUSTOMERID, CUSTOMERTEL, EXPRESSID, ORIGINORDERTIME, REASONID, REASON, SKURESULT from DB_RETURNMANAGERMENT where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select SEQUENCEID, NAME, REPLAYSTATUS, OPENFLAG, CREATOPER, CREATTIME, OPER, OPERTIME, CONTENTID, ORDERID, MESSAGEID, SHOPTYPEID, CUSTOMERNAME, CUSTOMERCOUNTRY, SHOPTYPE, ORDERSTATUS, ORDERSOURCE, ORDERTIME, CUSTOMERCOUNTRYID, CUSTOMERCOUNTRYEN, CONTENT, DISPOSEFLAG, RETURNPROSTATUS, RETURNMONEYSTATUS, REPLAYORDERID, RETURNDESCR, RETURNFLAG, ACTUALSAVENUM, KEYWORDS, CUSTOMERID, CUSTOMERTEL, EXPRESSID, ORIGINORDERTIME, REASONID, REASON, SKURESULT from DB_RETURNMANAGERMENT
